Scoresheet steps
 (1) Selects the variables of interest

```{r}
load('spotify_songs.RData')
spotify_songs$length <- (spotify_songs$duration_ms*.001)/60
scoresheet <- read_excel("scoresheet.xlsx")
scored_data <- scorekeep(spotify_songs, scoresheet)
spotify_clean <- scored_data[[1]]
save(spotify_clean, file = 'spotify_clean.RData')

```
